Plot: The tumultuous early history of the Central Intelligence Agency is viewed through the prism of one man's life.
Title: The Good Shepherd
Actors: Matt Damon, Angelina Jolie, Alec Baldwin, Tammy Blanchard
tomatoConsensus: Though ambitious and confidently directed by Robert De Niro, The Good Shepherd is ultimately a tedious drama that holds few surprises and succumbs to self-seriousness.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 2 wins & 11 nominations.
